Blog.post: Howdy ya'll!! surprise it's me becca in case you didn't know. Well my mom got my underwater camera developed they don't look as fun as they were to make but they're still really cool. So I'll put in some of my favorite so you guys can check them out. This one is of my sister Tammy she's a loser urlLink http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v433/meccabeanyo/underwater/tammy.jpg This one is of the love of my life Sarah my niece. urlLink http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v433/meccabeanyo/underwater/sarahandme.jpg I love Amanda's face in this picture urlLink http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v433/meccabeanyo/underwater/mandaandme2.jpg Jenny has a fat bubble coming out of her nose urlLink http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v433/meccabeanyo/underwater/jennyanddustin.jpg this is my best friend in the whole world JANICE!! urlLink http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v433/meccabeanyo/underwater/jennyanddustin.jpg this it my little buddy veed (Dylan) urlLink http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v433/meccabeanyo/underwater/dylan.jpg so there you go I hope you enjoyed these wonderful works of art. oh in case you were wondering about the title it's morsecode. In your face I know morsecode!! peace out! urlLink

Well today was fun. I laughed a lot. I really love to laugh you always know it's a good laugh when your abs start to hurt or maybe that's form laughing too much who knows. Well there it 18 days left of my last summer in high school. I can't wait to get back to school I miss it. I know some people are going to say I'm crazy for wanting to go back to school but that's ok. I finally used up my underwater camera I hope my mom doesn't forget tomorrow because I can't wait to see them they're going to be really funny. well I guess I'll go but don't forget to stay classy.

Hello, how are you today? Well this is my first entry in my new blog. I really don't have much to say right now but I haven't really done anything today. Oh wait Janice just threw a chip on the floor well that's what it looked like to me she really just dropped it was funny. So that's really all I have to say I know that you were on the edge of your seat but don't worry i'll come back to feed your addiction. Stay classy and I love you!

Hi guys! Well this past weekend I went with Janice and her family to New Branufels it was a lot of fun. I almost died in the rapids that was fun. And I miss my boy! Today I was at my dad's house and me and my step brothers watched the X games. It was so cool. All I have to say is that Chuck Carothers landed a kick ass trick and took the gold. There is a picture under this. That's him. Later guys peace out!
urlLink he is the first person to land it so it doesn't have a name yet

Well last night was fun. Poor Cooper dog got bit by a snake or snakes 3 times his front right paw all the way up to his shoulder was swollen it looked like a lion paw it was very sad. It's about 11:45 pm when I let him and saw his foot so I called my brother to tell what happened he was in downtown Houston and hour and a half away. I had to walk down to the Meyer's house to get Dustin to help me pick Cooper up and put him in the truck. Then had to ride in the back of the truck to the emergency vet clinic. it just so happened that Dr. Hablinski, Cooper's vet, as well as our pets vet, was there that night (his very good I recommend him). He took care of Cooper and come to find out that there was 4 other snake bites that night and another on the way. So the snakes were busy last night. Don't worry he's doing very well and has been in the litter box a few times so he's a whole lot better. Hear is a pictures that I took of his foot today. urlLink http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v433/meccabeanyo/pict0002.jpg

Hi welcome back! Oh man I already have schedule and I haven't even started school. Like meetings, pictures, and parking stickers and other stuff like, it sucks. I discovered, with help from a friend, Windows Movie Maker it is the most amazing thing in the world I love it like no other. I've made two movies/slideshow one for Jenny and one for Janice they are the best. This weekend I helped Jenny feed the animals at our neighbor's little farm so I'm going to share some of the pictures I took. This is of the teenage chickens: urlLink http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v433/meccabeanyo/on%20the20farm/teenagechicken.jpg This is of the really hyper dog I would tell you his name but I forgot, sorry: urlLink http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v433/meccabeanyo/on%20the%20farm/hyperdog.jpg This one is of the horse and a little of Janice: urlLink http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v433/meccabeanyo/on%20the%20farm/horse.jpg This is me if I lived on a farm: urlLink http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v433/meccabeanyo/on%20the%20farm/CowgirlBecca.jpg So there you go my weekend being a farm hand. Peace out guys!

Hi! humm so my brother and I went on a little "date" to go see The Village it was really good there were some thing that I didn't see them coming it was crazy. We were a little late because of the Puddle Mudd/3 doors down/nickleback concert there was on parking so we had to go to almost the other side on the mall but me made it and we had to sit in the very front row and the people looked really funny. I did have more to say but I forgot that sucks, huh? Maybe it will come to me later. So uh peace out ya'll! Woot! I remember. So I was wondering what the M in M. Night Shyamalanâ€™s name stands for I think it something simple like Mike: Mike Night Shyamalan. I like it. It works. You guys can come up with whatever you want as long as it starts with an M. Guess what hapened today in history. Captain Juan Antonio Perez de Almazan, the commander of San Antonio de Bexar Presidio, presided over the first election in Texas History. Isn't that nice. Oh and more news I got an email from my Uncle Ramiro he's in Iraq. It feels really good to hear form him. Here goes his email. hello.how are youll doing.im doing fine .ill be doing alot better at beginning of next month because im going home for awhile.ive done my year finally.let me know if you need anything from this place.ramsey is going to wharton junior collage.he got a schalorship for a year.i want to see him play collage ball.well ill be talking to you later.say hi to your mom.take care an be safe(driving). your uncle ramiro Ok now i'm really going be safe guys.
